title: Reverse engineer a PS-EXE file
content:
I'm playing currently a CTF, i was asked to find the flag in PX-EXE file. Its architecture is MIPS. When i type file command in the terminal i get the following: 

Sony Playstation executable PC=0x8005d448, .text=[0x8005d000,0x15800], Stack=0x801ffff0, (Europe area)

Any ideas or helpful links please ? Thanks

answers_data.content: IDA Pro supports the PSX-EXE file format.
